languages.text: "Биоманты вроде меня в первую очередь овладевают процессами в собственном теле — в том числе и контроль за старением". {n}Хейнрикс криво улыбается.{/n} "Поверь мне, я выглядел бы совершенно иначе, если бы оставлял на себе все следы того, что мне удалось пережить".

traits.locale_text: "Биоманты вроде меня в первую очередь овладевают процессами в собственном теле — в том числе и контроль за старением". {n}Хейнрикс лукаво улыбается.{/n} "И не надо сбрасывать со счетов пару курсов омолаживающими препаратами".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."
languages.original_text: "Биоманты вроде меня в первую очередь овладевают процессами в собственном теле — в том числе и контроль за старением". {n}Хейнрикс криво улыбается.{/n} "Поверь мне, я выглядел бы совершенно иначе, если бы оставлял на себе все следы того, что мне удалось пережить".

traits.locale_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including aging." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "And don't forget that agents of the Inquisition have access to rejuvenating treatments and other valuable luxuries of the Imperium."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including aging." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "And don't forget that agents of the Inquisition have access to rejuvenating treatments and other valuable luxuries of the Imperium."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “像我们这样的生物系灵能者，训练的第一步就是控制我们自己身体的运作，包括衰老。”{n}海因里希露出了狡猾的微笑。{/n}“我在工作中经历过无数危险。如果把所有的痕迹都保留下来，我看起来恐怕会和现在截然不同。”
languages.original_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."

traits.locale_text: “像我们这样的生物系灵能者，训练的第一步就是控制我们自己身体的运作，包括衰老。”{n}海因里希露出了狡猾的微笑。{/n}“我在工作中经历过无数危险。如果把所有的痕迹都保留下来，我看起来恐怕会和现在截然不同。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."

languages.text: «El primer paso para los biomantes como yo es controlar los procesos de su propio cuerpo, incluido el paso de la edad». {n}Heinrix sonríe de forma siniestra.{/n} «He sufrido innumerables heridas durante mi trabajo. De haber permitido que quedara algún rastro de todas ellas, ahora tendría un aspecto totalmente distinto».
languages.original_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."

traits.locale_text: «El primer paso para los biomantes como yo es controlar los procesos de su propio cuerpo, incluido el paso de la edad». {n}Heinrix sonríe de forma siniestra.{/n} «He sufrido innumerables heridas durante mi trabajo. De haber permitido que quedara algún rastro de todas ellas, ahora tendría un aspecto totalmente distinto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「私のようなバイオマンサーにとって最初のステップは、自分自身の体のプロセスを制御することだ。老化を含めてな」{n}ハインリックスは歪んだ笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「私は仕事上、数え切れないほどの危険に耐えてきた。もし、その痕跡をすべて残しておいたら、今の私はまったく違った姿になっていただろう」
languages.original_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."

traits.locale_text: 「私のようなバイオマンサーにとって最初のステップは、自分自身の体のプロセスを制御することだ。老化を含めてな」{n}ハインリックスは歪んだ笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「私は仕事上、数え切れないほどの危険に耐えてきた。もし、その痕跡をすべて残しておいたら、今の私はまったく違った姿になっていただろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der erste Schritt in der Biomantie ist es, die Prozesse des eigenen Körpers zu kontrollieren — auch den Alterungsprozess." {n}Heinrix grinst schief.{/n} "Ich habe im Verlauf meiner Arbeit unzähligen Gefahren getrotzt — würde ich zulassen, dass all ihre Spuren von Dauer sind, würde ich heute völlig anders aussehen."
languages.original_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."

traits.locale_text: "Der erste Schritt in der Biomantie ist es, die Prozesse des eigenen Körpers zu kontrollieren — auch den Alterungsprozess." {n}Heinrix grinst schief.{/n} "Ich habe im Verlauf meiner Arbeit unzähligen Gefahren getrotzt — würde ich zulassen, dass all ihre Spuren von Dauer sind, würde ich heute völlig anders aussehen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pour les biomanciens tels que moi, la première étape consiste à prendre le contrôle de son propre corps, ce qui inclut la maîtrise du vieillissement, {n}explique Heinrix avec un sourire en coin.{/n} J'ai été confronté à bien des aléas dans mon travail. Si j'en avais conservé la moindre trace, mon apparence serait très différente aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."

traits.locale_text: « Pour les biomanciens tels que moi, la première étape consiste à prendre le contrôle de son propre corps, ce qui inclut la maîtrise du vieillissement, {n}explique Heinrix avec un sourire en coin.{/n} J'ai été confronté à bien des aléas dans mon travail. Si j'en avais conservé la moindre trace, mon apparence serait très différente aujourd'hui. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Biz biyobazlara ilk öğretilen, kendi bedeninin işleyişine hükmetmektir. Yaşlanmak da buna dâhil." {n}Heinrix adice gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bugüne dek başıma bin türlü musibet geldi... Her birinin izi kalmış olsa şimdi beni tanıyamazdın."
languages.original_text: "The first step for biomancers such as myself is to take control of the processes of their own body — including ageing." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "I have endured innumerable hazards in my work — if I allowed every trace of them to remain, I would look completely different today."

traits.locale_text: "Biz biyobazlara ilk öğretilen, kendi bedeninin işleyişine hükmetmektir. Yaşlanmak da buna dâhil." {n}Heinrix adice gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bugüne dek başıma bin türlü musibet geldi... Her birinin izi kalmış olsa şimdi beni tanıyamazdın."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
